top_stories.title: CES 2026: JBL launches stylish $150 OpenSound earclips for all-day wear
top_stories.description: JBL unveiled its first OpenSound earclips, the Soundgear CLIPS, at CES 2025 in Las Vegas on January 5, 2026. These lightweight devices clip comfortably onto the ear, employing air-conduction technology to deliver sound while maintaining environmental awareness. The Soundgear CLIPS form part of JBL’s open-ear headphone line. Their clip-on design uses soft TPU material with […]
top_stories.author: Emre Çıtak

top_stories.title: AI agent-driven browser automation for enterprise workflow management
top_stories.description: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. Despite significant technology investments, knowledge workers routinely navigate between eight to twelve different web applications during standard workflows, constantly switching contexts and manually transferring information between systems. Data entry and validation tasks […]

top_stories.title: ASUS to unveil AI-powered PC lineup at CES 2026
top_stories.description: ASUS will launch its CES 2026 product lineup with new AI PCs and technology through a virtual event and a Las Vegas showroom, introducing adaptive devices powered by NPUs to support work, creativity, and everyday life. The lineup features a new generation of adaptive, AI-driven devices equipped with powerful neural processing units, or NPUs. These […]
top_stories.author: Emre Çıtak

top_stories.title: Optimizing LLM inference on Amazon SageMaker AI with BentoML’s LLM- Optimizer
top_stories.description: In this post, we demonstrate how to optimize large language model (LLM) inference on Amazon SageMaker AI using BentoML's LLM-Optimizer to systematically identify the best serving configurations for your workload.
top_stories.author: Josh Longenecker
top_stories.content: In this post, we demonstrate how to optimize large language model (LLM) inference on Amazon SageMaker AI using BentoML's LLM-Optimizer to systematically identify the best serving configurations for your workload.

top_stories.title: HCLSoftware to acquire Jaspersoft for reported $240M
top_stories.description: HCLSoftware Inc. plans to acquire Jaspersoft Inc., a provider of business intelligence software, in an all-cash deal reportedly valued at $240 million. The company announced the transaction on Monday. In conjunction, HCLSoftware disclosed that it’s buying Wobby, an early-stage startup with an artificial intelligence tool for querying data warehouses. The transaction is reportedly worth $5.3 […] The post HCLSoftware to acquire Jaspersoft for reported $240M appeared first on SiliconANGLE.
top_stories.author: Maria Deutscher
